title: Long Hoa
description: Although there is a menu posted on the wall, the owner, who speaks fair English, simply asks foreigners if you want rice (with soup) or noodles. Main dishes are vegan but some dessert items are made elsewhere and may contain milk or eggs. Be sure to confirm. Basic, local atmosphere with fans and steel tables and stools. No Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: 866 Ton Duc Thang, Hoa Khanh Bac Lien Chieu
